message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $108?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $102.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $102, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we try $110 again?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go back to $110. How about we meet at $101?
